resources.string: Success! Your device has been configured and joined to your target network!
Failed to socket connection, please try again.

Provisioning with Bluetooth® Low Energy is a method that will configure your Wi-Fi+BLE Combo device via an attached Bluetooth® Low Energy radio. Once connected, router information will be sent to specialized Bluetooth® Low Energy characteristics and the device will connect/confirm the configured network parameters.
Failed to connect to the device.
Please press the SCAN button to search for devices.
IoT Sensors needs access to the device\'s storage in order to save/load config files and create log files and access to location information in order to scan for Bluetooth Smart devices.
Access to location information is required in order to scan for Bluetooth Smart devices.
Access to the device\'s storage is required in order to save/load config files and create log files.
It may be required to enable the Location Services on your device in order to scan for Bluetooth Smart devices.

This device does not support the Renesas IoT Sensors service. If the device was previously used with different functionality (e.g. SmartTag), you may need to unpair it and/or restart Bluetooth in system settings.
Set low (off) and high (on) threshold for proximity sensor.
Please remove any obstructions from the proximity sensor and press start.
Place the device on a horizontal flat surface with the LED upwards and press start.
Place the device on a horizontal flat surface with the logo upwards and press start.
Please enable cloud to get a user ID.
Sending cloud application URL, please wait…
Email with cloud application URL sent successfully
ERROR: unable to send web app link
ERROR: Unable to get EK-IDs from cloud
There is no EK-ID for the app
ERROR: Unable to get data from cloud
There is no data for the selected sensor
ERROR: Unable to post alerting rule
ERROR: Unable to get rules from cloud
There is no rule for the app
ERROR: Unable to post control rule
ERROR: Unable to get control rules from cloud
There is no control rule for the app
ERROR: Unable to post asset tag
ERROR: Unable to update amazon account info
No internet connection\nCheck your mobile data or Wi-Fi
ERROR: unable to get user ID from cloud.
ERROR: Unable to post data to IFTTT
ERROR: unable to send device application link info
ERROR: unable to send IoT app info
ERROR: unable to send the applied Web Hook Key to the cloud
Unable to get the IFTTT key or IFTTT key not found
ERROR: User ID mismatch. Please, contact your administrator.
